TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ComponentCommands extends System.Object
public ref class ComponentCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组标准的与组件相关的命令，这些命令具有预定义的按键输入笔势和 属性。

span.span: Provides a standard set of component-related commands, which have predefined key input gestures and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的命令类和命令中的其他命令库类，如和，用于表示一组的应用程序程序员经常遇到的常见命令。The commands in the class and commands in the other command library classes, such as and , are intended to represent a set of common commands that application programmers encounter frequently. 命令仅表示的实例和不该命令的实现逻辑。The commands only represent the instance of the and not the implementation logic for the command. 实现逻辑绑定到通过命令。The implementation logic is bound to the command via a . 例如，如果控件 （命令目标），执行的逻辑上执行命令命令可能无法提供的命令目标，因此应用程序编写器不负责编写逻辑，用于确定如何命令目标处理该命令。For example, if the command is executed on a control (the command target), the logic that performs the command may not be provided by the command target, so the application writer is responsible for writing the logic that determines how the command target handles the command. 许多控件提供实现逻辑，但是，对于许多命令库中的命令。Many controls do provide implementation logic, though, for many of the commands in the command library. 例如，类提供了逻辑命令，命令，命令，命令，和命令。For example, the class provides logic for the command, command, command, command, and command. 请参阅类文档的特定控件类的详细信息。See the class documentation for particular control classes for more information. 有关命令和命令的详细信息，请参阅[命令概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information on commands and commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ExtendSelectionDown As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ ExtendSelectionDown { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取表示“向下扩展选择”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Extend Selection Down command.
The command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示有意扩展选定范围向下拖动。This command indicates the intention to extend the selection downward. 不一定存在对任何给定的对象; 上的命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 获取表示“选择到开头”命令的值。

The command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示扩展的目的选择的项从当前项的第一个项目。This command indicates the intention to extend select the items from the current item to the first item. 不一定存在对任何给定的对象; 上的命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SelectToPageDown As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ SelectToPageDown { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取表示“选择下一页”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Select To Page Down command.
The command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示有意从当前项下移一页中进行选择。This command indicates the intention to select from the current item down one page. 不一定存在对任何给定的对象; 上的命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SelectToPageUp As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ SelectToPageUp { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取表示“选择上一页”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Select To Page Up command.
The command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示选择从一页的当前项的意图。This command indicates the intention to select from the current item up one page. 不一定存在对任何给定的对象; 上的命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
